alert.note: Alert for Davis; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:00PM CDT until June 06 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR EASTERN DAVIS AND SOUTHEASTERN WAPELLO COUNTIES... At 400 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Batavia to near Milton to 10 miles southeast of Bloomfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Davis and southeastern Wapello Counties, including the following locations... Eldon, Agency, Bloomfield Municipal Airport, Floris and Pulaski. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
